revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Col. I - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - (20(?) Bundles of sheets (?) 20) Panemos 21 Purchased through Diskos 50 rolls From these [there were issued): To Demetrios for the accounting office 10 22 To Artemon 4 To Sotairon 4 24 To Pyron, designated for the daily accounts 1 roll 25 To Demetrios, for the (accounting office) of Nikanor 10 rolls 27 To Peisikles, for wrappers for flax 1/2 roll - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 1/2 28 To Pyron, (designated for the daily accounts) 1 roll 29 To Demetrios, for the accounting office of Nikanor 10 Loios 3 To Pyron, for the assignment list of olive oil 1 roll To Demetrios, for the accounting office 5 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 2 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -- rolls Col. II - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - (Purchased through) Charmos 20 rolls Of these Demetrios has received for the accounting office 18 To Pyron 2 Total 20 11 To Demetrios, for the accounting office 10 15 To Demetrios 10 16 To Pyron 11 To Artemon 10 17 To Demetrios, for the (accounting office) 10 18 To Demetrios, for 10 19 To Demetrios 10 To Artemon 10 Total 91 rolls 20 To Demetrios, for the accounting office (20) To Artemon 10 21 To Demetrios 10 To Artemon 10 2- To Demetrios 20 To Demetrios 20 To Artemon 10 Total 191 rolls [?] 60 rolls were purchased through - - - at 3 1/2 obols, Total 35 [drachmas] -- Artemon 10 Col. III ------------------------------ Artemon (10) 30 To Demetrios, those bought through Charmos, designated for Nikanor 20 To Artemon 10 Gorpiaios 1 To Demetrios, designated for Nikanor 10 To Pyron 1 2 To Demetrios 20 To Artemon 10 10 3 To Demetrios 20 To Artemon 10 4 To Demetrios (10) To --- los 1 To Pyron 2 5 To Artemidoros, writing memoranda(?) for Demetrios 10

listBibl.bibl: P.Col. III 4 P.Col.Zen. I 4 Cairo JdE 51668, mentioned and partly published in P.Cair.Zen. IV 59688, preserves missing lower part Youtie's suggestion about line 2, AJP 56 (1935) 178, is rejected in "Corrigenda to volume 1," P.Col. IV p. 203; about lines 1-2, see Lewis (Papyrus in Classical Antiquity) p. 79 n. 18
